text: Ya sarvasrestha allahane nirdharita kelelya sima aheta ani jo koni allaha ani tyace rasula (paigambara sallallahu alaihi vasallama) yancya adesace palana karila, tyala allaha jannatamadhye dakhala karila, jyancya khali nahari (pravaha) vahata asatila, jyata te nehami nehami rahatila, ani hi phara mothi saphalata ahe
